name: Doge Dimensions
description:
Explore The Galaxy: Take advantage of Doge’s robust movement options to explore 3 far-off planets, and take on unique challenges

Gooba's Gambit

Fight hoards of Gooba’s in a grueling gauntlet to the death. Collect their eyeballs and be wary of their Slime Slinging Slashes

Coin Chase

Collect as many coins as possible while navigating a forest of crystals and evading perilous sandstorms

Hidden Hams

Look through every crack and crevice as you explore the sacred Hidden Ham Hills to satisfy your hungry Doge.
